td.p: Thomson, John. Journal, Mackenzie River, 1800-1802. An electronic transcription. MFTP #0021

div.p: 2½ skins of Pounded & Dried Meat – 1 origl skin & 1 do Shirt[.]
Friday the 12th[.] Gave the 2 Boys 8 skins on Credit & sent the y Man to hunt hares[.]

Saturday the 13th[.] Two y Men from the other side arrived[,] gave them drams & ps of tobacco, one of them is of the Band that came here the 20th ultimo without his Credits[.] They now paid 30 skins Credits & traded 15½ skins – 2 cascamisks, 1 origl skin & 1 carribou collet[.] In the evening 4 Men & 2 boys arrived[,] three of them are of the same Band that came here the 20th ultimo without their Credits – they say that they would have come sooner, were it not that Two or Three of their Relations are sick, which is the reason that still detains the others from coming[.] These Indians early in the Fall saw the Partridge & band, only Six or Seven days march off, he then told them that if there was a Fort at the Rocky Mountain he would go to it & pay his Credits there, the other Fort being at too great a distance to go to it &c – desired them to tell him not to come here on any consideration for if he did he would not be received, as there is a Chief at the other Fort with plenty of Goods to Trade with all the Beaver Inds[,] besides we have only just a sufficient quantity of Goods here for the Rocky Mountain Indians &c[.] Now if I pleased I might with the greatest ease, that is by only consenting to those Indians coming here make at least 15 or 20 Packs more – altho I will freely own that it affords me a great pleasure as any of my neighbors to make many Packs at my own Post – but at the same time I have resolutions enough to lay aside that pleasure, when it interferes with the Interest – as I think it would were I to allow those Indians to come here – for I am fully of oppinion that by their being seperated in Two Posts they will work much better &c and besides by their going to the Fort that is intended for them, it will be the Means of so much of the Returns being carried without any Expenses so far on their way out[.]
Sunday the 14th[.] Received 87 Skins Credits & Traded 37 skins[,] most of the Skins are Beavers – likewise traded 4 Placettes[,]
